**Full API**
============

.. _Parsing:
.. _Processing:
.. _Integrating:
.. _ELF Caver:

This sections defines every function in the project, either public or private.
It is highly recommend to use the :doc:`public_api` documentation instead.

.. seealso::
    - :doc:`data_structures`
    - :doc:`public_api`
